title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: In this world where cryptocurrencies have become mainstream, there are many entrepreneurs inspired by the crypto dynamics wanting to venture into the domain but do not have enough funds. Raising capital has been one of the most important challenges for crypto startups, and to make the process easier, came Crypto launchpads. Basically, crypto launchpads are platforms where projects can display themselves to an investor pool, from where they can raise funds in exchange for the projectâ€™s tokens. As of June 2022, there are nearly 70 crypto launchpads assisting various niche-based crypto startups.One of them is AdLunam, which is working hard to make a dent in this industry with its unique Engage to Earn model. Learn more: adlunam.cc

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: Crypto launchpads have proven to be an excellent tool for businesses seeking to generate funds as they have simplified the process of reaching out to investors. While looking for some innovative launchpad, I came across Adlunam, Crypto's First NFT-Integrated Engage to Earn Seed Crowdfunding and IDO Launchpad With a Proof of Attention Allocation Model. For more information, visit adlunam.cc
